divs: sighting detailson june 10th, 2008, from 957-1001am i was on my way home from college but still on the campus of salt lake community college in taylorsville when i saw 2 "balloons" over a building to my left, they kept the same distance apart, and when a plane came into view i realized the supposed balloons werent on a tether or tower, and they had to be free roaming, however staying at the same distance away for about a minute w\out getting smaller puzzled me. i thought oh well, and looked away, and they had moved a little to the right, i thought that i just remembered their location wrong. and it looked like they were moving around so they had to be drifting, even if very slowly on a windy day. i looked away again and started walking, and when i looked back they were completely gone, no sign at all. 30seconds later 2 airplanes were coming in to land at the airport and i saw them again this time over a field to my right cuz i had been walking, even though they were over the air traffic the whole time the building and hte field were just a point of reference for me. however they were 3 of em now. and they were in a triangular formation, they were still round like balloons, and they were rotating in place as if they were on a wheel. they kept perfect distance apart and were formed as a perfect triangle, each "balloon" being a point of an invisible line. i realized at this point they were silver, having looked gray from one position, they now had sun glinting on them a little, also they were really high up, and yet looked like a balloon had just escaped and was only a few feet up in the air, i knew this cuz the 2 airplanes i saw right before the 3 objects were very close to the ground and the objects were over it. the objects moved in together and created a stacked formation, one on top of the other like they were toy blocks, and stayed that way for about 5 second before coming into the original triangle formation. same distance apart as before. i suddenly got the chills from watching, and i knew it wasnt military or balloon or normal aircraft from the behavior i had just seen, i reached for my phone to call some one, my gaze shifted a little while reaching for it, cuz when i looked back they were gone again, just vanished. the whole thing mst have lasted 3-4min. i was alone at time i saw it, but other people were around me when i first saw the 2 objects the first time. the sky was clear of clouds and completely blue, it was too windy for the balloons to have stayed in one spot and did what they did. i have felt uncomfrotable being alone and going to bed at night since this happened. i am also unsure if the 3 that i saw were the 2 earlier ones + 1, or if it was a completely different set of objects, so at a minimum i saw 2, and at the most i could have seen 3 or 5, depending on if 2 of the 3 objects were the same ones from before.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Taylorsville
There were no other sightings in Taylorsville on or around June 10th 2008
